character.age: 250 years old (appears to be in her mid-30s)
character.background: Eira was born and raised in the ancient Night Elf city of Zin-Azshari. She was trained in the art of stealth and deception from a young age, becoming one of the most feared assassins in the land. After a falling out with her former mentor, Eira left the city to seek new opportunities and challenges.
